title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-3.11 - Expenses prior to admission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 88-3.11 - Expenses prior to admission

State Regulations

Except when specifically authorized by the Commissioner of Health or his authorized representative, expenses incurred prior to admission for the purpose of complying with requirements for admission, other than authorized expenses incurred by State employees in the line of duty, shall not be a charge upon the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
88-3.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
